original_title: Celsius 41.11: The Temperature at Which the Brain... Begins to Die
overview: This film attempts to correct the record when it comes to the left's attacks on President Bush, 9/11 and the war in Iraq and Kerry's 20-year tenure in the Senate.
tagline: The truth behind the lies of Fahrenheit 9/11
title: Celsius 41.11: The Temperature at Which the Brain... Begins to Die
